alert.note: Alert for Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine; Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains; Canyon Ferry Area; Cascade County below 5000ft; Elkhorn and Boulder Mountains; Gates of the Mountains; Helena Valley; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap; Little Belt and Highwood Mountains; Meagher County Valleys; Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass; Western and Central Chouteau County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 05 at 7:10AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Lewis and Clark, northwestern Broadwater, northwestern Meagher, northwestern Judith Basin, northeastern Jefferson, central Chouteau and Cascade Counties through 815 AM MDT... At 708 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a band of rain and very strong winds along a line extending from 17 miles west of Big Sandy to 12 miles northwest of Helena. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts in excess of 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar and sensor indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs, power lines, and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Great Falls, Helena, Fort Benton, East Helena, Belt, Geraldine, Montana City, Highwood, Black Eagle, Carter, Fort Logan On The Smith River, Floweree, York, Alhambra, Spring Meadow Lake State Park, Eden, Austin, Stockett, Shonkin and Loma. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
